Dear Harry:
I am enclosing herewith the report just received from the Prix Italia
in connection with the International Competition for 1954.
I would suggest that this be duplicated and distributed to the membership.
I hope you notice that our representative Henry Leff was the Chairman
of the music jury.
With all best wishes, believe me,
sns/jg
" Tlie Voice Of Tlie City
